page.title: 16HIGHAM FUNDAY
page.content: THE HIGHAM FUNDAY WAS ON A SUNDAY THE 23RD OF JUNE. IT STARTED AT 2.00PM AND WENT ON UNTIL 5.00PM.THEY WERE THROWING SPONGES AT PEOPLE IN STOCKS.THERE WERE COCONUT SHIES AND WHEN THEY HIT A COCONUT THEY WON A COCONUT OR A GOLD FISH.THERE WAS A GAME CALLED PICK A STICK AND SOME HORSES TO RIDE.THERE WAS A PING PONG POND WHERE YOU HAD TO SCOOP OUT A PING PONG AND IT HAD A NUMBER ON IT AND IT WOULKD TELL YOU IF YOU WOULD WIN A PRIZE. THER WAS A LUCKY DIP ,A FIRE ENGINE,CANDY FLOSS,AND A DISCO.THERE WAS BOBBING APPLES AND PLANTS FOR SALE AND A 5-ASIDE FOOTBALL MATCH. THE MONEY WAS GOING TO OUR PRIMARY SCHOOL TO BUY A MINIBUS OR ANOTHER COMPUTER.MOST OF THE VILLAGE CAME TO SUPPORT IT.
